  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class Description
    org.eclipse.nebula.paperclips.core.DebugPrint
    Reminder to remove references to DebugPrint when you're done debugging a print job.
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.oscilloscope.Oscilloscope

    use OscilloscopeDispatcher
    org.eclipse.nebula.visualization.xygraph.util.SingleSourceHelper
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.toolbar.ToolbarConfiguration
    Use the more general RichTextEditorConfiguration

    Method Description

    org.eclipse.nebula.animation.effects.AlphaEffect.fadeOnClose(Shell, int, IMovement)
    Use AlphaEffect.fadeOnClose(Shell,int,IMovement,AnimationRunner) instead
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.ganttchart.ISettings.forceMouseWheelVerticalScroll()
    By default mousewheel now scrolls chart vertically on all platforms. To turn off, flag scrollChartVerticallyOnMouseWheel()

  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.oscilloscope.Oscilloscope(Composite, int)
    use Oscilloscope
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextCellEditor(Composite, ToolbarConfiguration)
    Use a constructor with RichTextEditorConfiguration parameter
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextCellEditor(Composite, ToolbarConfiguration, int)
    Use a constructor with RichTextEditorConfiguration parameter
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextEditor(Composite, ToolbarConfiguration)
    use constructors that take a RichTextEditorConfiguration
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextEditor(Composite, ToolbarConfiguration, int)
    use constructors that take a RichTextEditorConfiguration
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.richtext.RichTextEditorConfiguration(ToolbarConfiguration)
    Use the no-arg constructor instead and set the values directly to the created RichTextEditorConfiguration
    org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.xviewer.util.internal.dialog.XFilteredTree(Composite, int, PatternFilter)
    As of 3.5, replaced by #FilteredTree(Composite, int, PatternFilter, boolean) where using the new look is encouraged
